ppy/osu-wiki.summary: The osu! wiki repository has seen recent activity with multiple pull requests focused on updating tournament listings and event information, including the addition of team submissions for MWC 7K 2025 and the creation of articles for the ANZT6W tournament, as well as updates to community events.

ppy/osu.summary: The osu! repository has experienced significant activity, with several pull requests addressing various aspects of the game, including the addition of basic difficulty and performance calculation for the Autopilot mod, adjustments to rhythm considerations in osu!taiko, and rebalancing of star rating and performance points, showcasing ongoing efforts to enhance gameplay and address player feedback.

ppy/osu-web.summary: The osu-web repository has seen a recent pull request aimed at replacing ts-loader and terser with swc, indicating efforts to optimize and modernize the web application's build process.

ppy/SDL3-CS.summary: The SDL3-CS repository has a pull request focused on updating bindings, including the addition of pen support for iOS and Android, as well as the removal of certain files, demonstrating the ongoing evolution of the project to incorporate new features and improve compatibility.
